response.name: [CT16] Verificar detalhes do filme

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Inception",
  "synopsis": "Dom Cobb is a skilled thief who specializes in stealing secrets from deep within the subconscious during dreams. Given a chance to have his criminal history erased, he's tasked with the impossible: planting an idea into someone's mind—a process known as inception. As the team ventures deeper into layered dreams, the line between reality and imagination begins to blur.",
  "director": "Christopher Nolan",
  "genres": [
                "Science Fiction",
                "Action"
            ],
  "duration": 148,
  "classification": "PG-13",
  "poster": "inception.jpg",
  "releaseDate": "2010-07-16"
}
